GeneDef.label: fleshmass thinker
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh in their brains, capable of some limited thought and communication with the carrier. This allows them to process information from several points of view and conduct passive research.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Each <color=#8a8ae6>colonist</color> over 1 significantly reduces the effect.
<color=#ffec85>Ignores all quest, prisoner, mutant, duplicate and deathresting pawns.</color>

GeneDef.label: fleshmass armor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh all over their skin which provides decent protection but damages clothing due to constant mutations and growths.

GeneDef.label: fleshmass builder
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh with nests of archites capable of performing some construction work and repairing buildings.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Can only work on 3 <color=#8a8ae6>buildings</color> or <color=#8a8ae6>frames</color> at a time.
Each <color=#8a8ae6>colonist</color> over 1 significantly reduces the effect.
<color=#ffec85>Does not haul resources and does not repair breakdowns.</color>
